pageProps.title: React Native Components: Building Blocks for Your App
pageProps.metaDesc:
React Native is a popular framework that allows developers to build high-quality mobile apps using JavaScript and React. One of the key benefits of React Native is its component-based architecture, which allows developers to create reusable UI elements that can be easily shared across different parts of an app.

In this article, we'll take a closer look at React Native components, their role in app development, and how to build them.
